committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to inform the public the public concerning the differences in delivery times between first class mail and air mail.

summary.text: Truth in Mailing Act - Requires the Postal Service to disclose to the public the average delivery time required among major metropolitan areas with respect to both air mail and first class mail.

titles.title: A bill to inform the public the public concerning the differences in delivery times between first class mail and air mail.
